```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
```

```{r data_cleaning_deformities, eval = FALSE}
Deformities_ForR_Replication_1 <- subset(Deformities_ForR_Replication_1, `Total Number` != 0)
```

```{r deformed-variable, eval = FALSE}
Deformities_ForR_Replication_1 %>%
  mutate(Deformities_ForR_Replication_1,
         deformed = `Total Number` - `Number Normal`, 
         percentage_deformed = deformed / `Total Number`) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Glyphosate, y = percentage_deformed)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, se=TRUE) +
  labs (x = "Glyphosate concentration", y = "Percentage Deformed") 
```

```{r getting_numerical_outputs_model_deformities, eval = FALSE}
Deformities_ForR_Replication_1_New  <- Deformities_ForR_Replication_1 %>%
  mutate(Deformities_ForR_Replication_1,
         deformed = `Total Number` - `Number Normal`, 
         percentage_deformed = deformed / `Total Number`) 
model_replicate_1_deformities <- lm(percentage_deformed ~ Glyphosate, data = Deformities_ForR_Replication_1_New)
tidy(model_replicate_1_deformities)
```

$$ {\widehat{Replicate1Deformities}} = 0.956 + 0.00360~Glyphosate$$

```{r bar-plots_with_data_deformities, eval = FALSE}
Deformities_ForR_Replication_1_New %>%
  group_by(`Sample Type`) %>%
  summarize(mean_percentage_deformed = mean(percentage_deformed), sd = sd(percentage_deformed)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = `Sample Type`, y = mean_percentage_deformed)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean_percentage_deformed - sd, ymax=mean_percentage_deformed + sd))
```

